{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_TemplarAttack}} '''A_TemplarAttack'''
(no parameters) Does nothing if the calling actor has no valid target. Calls [[A_FaceTarget]] and plays the sound "templar/shoot" on the WEAPON channel. Sends 10 hitscan "pellets" that deal 2d4 disintegration damage each, with a vertical spread of up to 7° up or down and a horizontal spread of up to 11.25°. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Templar}} and actors inheriting from it.
